description: Define a single image analyzed in InForm.

export_data.description: These are the paths of the data elements created from InForm exports, although none are explicitly required here, what can be done downstream depends which of these are available.

component_data_tif_path.description: A tif image with layers representative of channels measuring each stain.

binary_segs_maps_tif_path.description: A tif image with layers such as an optional processed image area mask, a nuclear and membrane mask index integer coded, and region mask.

cell_seg_data_txt_path.description: A file with the cell-phenotypes assigned per cell index, and mean intensity measures sufficient for infering any binary phenotypes.

score_data_txt_path.description: A file with one or two scores used in assigning binary phenotype thresholds.
